sentences.sContent: When he said smelting, I said, OK, you got it.
sentences.sContent_eng: When he said smelting, I said, OK, you got it.
sentences.sCn: 当他说熔炼，我会说，好，你明白了。

sentences.sContent: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.sContent_eng: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.sCn: 锍，冰铜一种带有硫化物的金属混合物，由熔炼铜、铅或镍的硫化物矿石而制成。
